Desc.entry: Part of Speech and Language Therapy, Sheffield Primary Care Trust. Offers an assessment and ongoing support for children and adults who may benefit from the use of a communication aid. Individuals are assessed in school and/or their home or at Centenary House. The service has a limited loan pool of equipment for assessment and short-term trials and a small number of devices for longer-term loans. Clients are assisted to find other sources of equipment or funding when appopriate. Referral via speech and language therapy.

DisabledAccess.entry: Access via several steps with railings, Lifts - external and internal
